text:
Hi,
I think column type "Rich Text" in HubDB needs improvements. It only shows limited tools when creating contents. Having a "source code" option would be better.
hi, is there possible at all to orderBy a hubDB column? I have a multi select column that I am using for filtering in a dropdown and I was wondering if I can orderBy=Alphabetically the dropdown.
you will need to sort by the attribute, you can’t `orderBy` a columns sub properties in a HubDB query

yeah, we wanted it to be simple, but perhaps it’s too simple :slightly_smiling_face:. We’re discussing improvements there. That said, if you’re creating content, you should probably use a blog post or site page rather than HubDB.
